name: Death to Die
description:
Dastardly dice creatures have overtaken the Land of Rolling Hills. Explore the surface or take your chances in the dungeon. Use your wand and elementally-charged dice to fend off the many polyhedral foes in your way.

A game for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam

Programming - Piers Baker

Modelling - NascentSpace, Piers Baker

Animation - NascentSpace

SFX - Rowan Baker, Rhiannon Phillips

Music - Rowan Baker
